gstat.premade.shutthebox

Class ShutTheBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • gstat.premade.shutthebox.ShutTheBox

  • public class ShutTheBox
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulation of the game Shut The Box. A player rolls two dice and flips over numbered tiles ranging 1 to 9 equal to the dice roll. The game ends when the player flips all tiles or cannot flip anymore tokens.
    Author:
    Mike Onyszczak

      • turns

        public static int turns

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShutTheBox

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public static int play()
        Call this to run the game
        Returns:
        1 if victory 0 if loss

      • playSilent

        public static int playSilent()
        Call this to run the game without report prompts.
        Returns:
        1 if victory 0 if loss

      • flip

        public static void flip()
        Default AI for the game. Attempts to flip the highest number or combination of numbers. Changes tile to true if tile is used. Will set winState to -1 if no tiles can be flipped.

      • flop

        public static void flop()
        Optional AI for game based on a simple strategy of try to create high numbers and use single dice. Loses often. Win Rate less than 1%. Changes tile to true if tile is used. Will set winState to -1 if no tiles can be flipped. Implement by changing flip() to flop() in play or playSilent.

      • hasWon

        public static void hasWon()
        Checks to see if all tiles are flipped meaning the player has won. Will change winState to 1 to signify win, or will not change anything if game is ongoing.

      • printTiles

        public static java.lang.String printTiles()
        Prints the game board at the current time with "X" to represent flipped tiles.
        Returns:
        Game board at time of printing.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Main method that gathers statistics on one million games
        Parameters:
        args - args
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - This should never be thrown
